languages.text: {n}Маражай изгибает губы в усмешке.{/n} "Ты выделил{mf||а} мне {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}угодья{/d}... не то, к чему я привык, но вполне достаточно, чтобы занять себя, когда это корыто пронзает вуаль. Твой экипаж хорошо знает, какой сектор корабля принадлежит мне... и, кажется, уже решили, что вышвыривать туда нарушителей порядка — лучшее применение для него. Неважно. Они все кричат одинаково".

{n}Marazhai's lips curl into a smirk.{/n} "You granted me {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}territory{/d}... not the kind I am used to, but more than enough to keep me occupied while this tub cuts through the veil. Your crew know which sector of the ship belongs to me... and, apparently, they have designated it a dumping ground for rule breakers. It does not matter. Their screams all sound the same."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай изгибает губы в усмешке.{/n} "Ты выделил{mf||а} мне {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}угодья{/d}... не то, к чему я привык, но вполне достаточно, чтобы занять себя, когда это корыто пронзает вуаль. Твой экипаж хорошо знает, какой сектор корабля принадлежит мне... и, кажется, уже решили, что вышвыривать туда нарушителей порядка — лучшее применение для него. Неважно. Они все кричат одинаково".

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sonríe, burlón.{/n} «Me has otorgado un {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}territorio{/d}... no es como el que estoy acostumbrado a tener, pero es más que suficiente para entretenerme mientras esta bañera atraviesa el velo. Ahora tu tripulación sabe qué sector de la nave es mío... y por lo visto lo usan como vertedero de infractores. A mí no me importa, todos los gritos suenan igual».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips curl into a smirk.{/n} "You granted me {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}territory{/d}... not the kind I am used to, but more than enough to keep me occupied while this tub cuts through the veil. Your crew know which sector of the ship belongs to me... and, apparently, they have designated it a dumping ground for rule breakers. It does not matter. Their screams all sound the same."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sonríe, burlón.{/n} «Me has otorgado un territorio... no es como el que estoy acostumbrado a tener, pero es más que suficiente para entretenerme mientras esta bañera atraviesa el velo. Ahora tu tripulación sabe qué sector de la nave es mío... y por lo visto lo usan como vertedero de infractores. A mí no me importa, todos los gritos suenan igual».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的嘴角勾起一丝得意的笑容。{/n}“你赐予我属于我的{d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}领地{/d}……虽然我并不习惯这样的领地，但至少当这艘破船穿越亚空间的时候，我会有事情可以消遣。你的船员很清楚这艘船的哪个区域属于我……而且很显然，他们把那里当成了垃圾桶，所有破坏规矩的人都会丢到那里。不过我并不介意，反正他们的尖叫声听起来都一样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips curl into a smirk.{/n} "You granted me {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}territory{/d}... not the kind I am used to, but more than enough to keep me occupied while this tub cuts through the veil. Your crew know which sector of the ship belongs to me... and, apparently, they have designated it a dumping ground for rule breakers. It does not matter. Their screams all sound the same."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的嘴角勾起一丝得意的笑容。{/n}“你赐予我属于我的领地……虽然我并不习惯这样的领地，但至少当这艘破船穿越亚空间的时候，我会有事情可以消遣。你的船员很清楚这艘船的哪个区域属于我……而且很显然，他们把那里当成了垃圾桶，所有破坏规矩的人都会丢到那里。不过我并不介意，反正他们的尖叫声听起来都一样。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはニヤリと笑う。{/n}「お前は俺に{d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}縄張り{/d}を与えてくれた。以前持っていたものとは違うが、この船がヴェールを突き破る間、俺を夢中にさせるには十分なものだ。お前のクルーは、船のどのセクターが俺の手に落ちているのかを知っていて…その上でどうやら奴らは、そこを規則違反者ども専用のゴミ捨て場にしたようだ。そんなことはどうでもいい。叫び声などどれも同じように響く」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips curl into a smirk.{/n} "You granted me {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}territory{/d}... not the kind I am used to, but more than enough to keep me occupied while this tub cuts through the veil. Your crew know which sector of the ship belongs to me... and, apparently, they have designated it a dumping ground for rule breakers. It does not matter. Their screams all sound the same."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはニヤリと笑う。{/n}「お前は俺に{d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}縄張り{/d}を与えてくれた。以前持っていたものとは違うが、この船がヴェールを突き破る間、俺を夢中にさせるには十分なものだ。お前のクルーは、船のどのセクターが俺の手に落ちているのかを知っていて…その上でどうやら奴らは、そこを規則違反者ども専用のゴミ捨て場にしたようだ。そんなことはどうでもいい。叫び声などどれも同じように響く」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai se retroussent en un sourire.{/n} « Vous m'avez alloué un {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}territoire{/d}... certes pas du genre auquel je suis habitué, mais largement suffisant pour m'occuper pendant que ce rafiot traverse le voile. Votre équipage sait quel secteur du vaisseau m'appartient... et apparemment, ils en ont fait une sorte de dépotoir où se débarrasser de ceux qui enfreignent le règlement. Peu importe. Parias ou pas, leurs hurlements sont une douce mélodie à mes oreilles. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips curl into a smirk.{/n} "You granted me {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}territory{/d}... not the kind I am used to, but more than enough to keep me occupied while this tub cuts through the veil. Your crew know which sector of the ship belongs to me... and, apparently, they have designated it a dumping ground for rule breakers. It does not matter. Their screams all sound the same."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai se retroussent en un sourire.{/n} « Vous m'avez alloué un territoire... certes pas du genre auquel je suis habitué, mais largement suffisant pour m'occuper pendant que ce rafiot traverse le voile. Votre équipage sait quel secteur du vaisseau m'appartient... et apparemment, ils en ont fait une sorte de dépotoir où se débarrasser de ceux qui enfreignent le règlement. Pour moi, c'est du pareil au même. Parias ou pas, leurs hurlements sont une douce mélodie à mes oreilles. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Lippen verziehen sich zu einem verächtlichen Grinsen.{/n} "Ihr habt mir {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}Territorium{/d} gewährt ... nicht solches, wie ich es gewohnt bin, doch mehr als genug, um mich zu beschäftigen, während dieser Kübel den Schleier durchtrennt. Eure Crew weiß, welcher Sektor des Schiffs mir gehört ... und offenbar haben sie ihn zur Müllhalde für Regelbrecher erklärt. Aber das ist gleichgültig. Ihre Schreie klingen alle gleich."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips curl into a smirk.{/n} "You granted me {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}territory{/d}... not the kind I am used to, but more than enough to keep me occupied while this tub cuts through the veil. Your crew know which sector of the ship belongs to me... and, apparently, they have designated it a dumping ground for rule breakers. It does not matter. Their screams all sound the same."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Lippen verziehen sich zu einem verächtlichen Grinsen.{/n} "Ihr habt mir Territorium gewährt ... nicht solches, wie ich es gewohnt bin, doch mehr als genug, um mich zu beschäftigen, während dieser Kübel den Schleier durchtrennt. Eure Crew weiß, welcher Sektor des Schiffs mir gehört ... und offenbar haben sie ihn zur Müllhalde für Regelbrecher erklärt. Aber das ist gleichgültig. Ihre Schreie klingen alle gleich."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips curl into a smirk.{/n} "You granted me territory... not the kind I am used to, but more than enough to keep me occupied while this tub cuts through the veil. Your crew know which sector of the ship belongs to me... and, apparently, they have designated it a dumping ground for rule breakers. It does not matter. Their screams all sound the same."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın dudakları sırıtır bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Bana {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}bölge{/d} sağladın... Böylesine alışkın olmasam da örtüden geçtiğimiz esnada beni oyalaması yeter. Tayfan da geminin hangi sektörünün bana ait olduğunu biliyor. Anladığım kadarıyla... Benim sektörü kuralları çiğneyenlerin ceza alanı yapmışlar. Bana göre hava hoş. Hepsinin çığlığı aynı."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips curl into a smirk.{/n} "You granted me {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Compartment}territory{/d}... not the kind I am used to, but more than enough to keep me occupied while this tub cuts through the veil. Your crew know which sector of the ship belongs to me... and, apparently, they have designated it a dumping ground for rule breakers. It does not matter. Their screams all sound the same."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın dudakları sırıtır bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Bana bölge sağladın... Alışkın olduğum cinsten değil ama örtüden geçtiğimiz esnada beni oyalaması yeter. Tayfan da geminin hangi sektörünün bana ait olduğunu biliyor. Anladığım kadarıyla... Benim sektörü kuralları çiğneyenlerin ceza alanı yapmışlar. Bana göre hava hoş. Hepsinin çığlığı aynı."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
